yes.\""},{"lineNumber":188646,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、屋上――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle, rooftop—"},{"lineNumber":188647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、自然がいっぱいで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, it's full of nature,"},{"lineNumber":188648,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごいですね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's amazing, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":188649,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、俺様の城の屋上はいつもこんな感じだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, the rooftop of my castle is always like this.\""},{"lineNumber":188650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、キバ子ちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kibako-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":188651,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":188652,"originalJapaneseLine":"がさがさと草をかき分けてキバ子が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rustling through the grass, Kibako appeared."},{"lineNumber":188653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がう！　がうがうがう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gau! Gau gau gau!\""},{"lineNumber":188654,"originalJapaneseLine":"キバ子はランスを見つけると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Kibako spotted Rance,"},{"lineNumber":188655,"originalJapaneseLine":"パーッと満面の笑みを浮かべた。","translatedEnglishLine":"she revealed a big, beaming smile."},{"lineNumber":188656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なんだ撫でて欲しいのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, do you want me to pet you?\""},{"lineNumber":188657,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、ランスが手を伸ばすと――","translatedEnglishLine":"As Rance reached out his hand—"},{"lineNumber":188658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がうがうがう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gau gau gau!\""},{"lineNumber":188659,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":188660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぐるぐるぐるぐるー！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <Whirl whirl whirl whirl!>"},{"lineNumber":188661,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、キバ子はランスの周りを回り出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako started circling around Rance."},{"lineNumber":188662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、おととと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, whoa whoa whoa..."},{"lineNumber":188663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こらこら、落ち着かないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, calm down.\""},{"lineNumber":188664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……う？　はあ、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh? Haa, haa...\""},{"lineNumber":188665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おー、よしよし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, there there."},{"lineNumber":188666,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭撫でてやるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll pet your head.\""},{"lineNumber":188667,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭を撫でるという言葉に反応して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Reacting to the words 'pet your head,'"},{"lineNumber":188668,"originalJapaneseLine":"キバ子はパッと顔を輝かせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako's face suddenly lit whirl!>"},{"lineNumber":188672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、落ち着かんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, calm down!\""},{"lineNumber":188673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、はっ、はっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, hah...\""},{"lineNumber":188674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がうーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gauuuuu!\""},{"lineNumber":188675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どわあ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do wah!\""},{"lineNumber":188676,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドーンとキバ子がランスを押し倒す。","translatedEnglishLine":"With a thud, Kibako pushed Rance down."},{"lineNumber":188677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、はっ、はっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, hah...\""},{"lineNumber":188678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuu!\""},{"lineNumber":188679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":188680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <Lick lick lick lick lick lick lick lick>"},{"lineNumber":188681,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして嬉しそうにランスの頬をぺろぺろと","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, happily licking Rance's cheek repeatedly,"},{"lineNumber":188682,"originalJapaneseLine":"キバ子が舐めまくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kibako licked him nonstop."},{"lineNumber":188683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃあ、ランス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaa, Lord Rance!?\""},{"lineNumber":188684,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、俺は大丈夫だが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'm fine though...\""},{"lineNumber":188685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃはは、く、くすぐったい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, it-it's ticklish!"},{"lineNumber":188686,"originalJapaneseLine":"　く、首筋を舐めるんじゃない！","translatedEnglishLine":"D-don't lick my neck like that!"},{"lineNumber":188687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んぷ、こ、こら、キバ子！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nmpf, h-hey, Kibako!\""},{"lineNumber":188688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、やめんか、キバ子！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, stop it, Kibako!\""},{"lineNumber":188689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……う？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":188690,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがキバ子の小さな肩を掴んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance grabbed Kibako's small shoulders,"},{"lineNumber":188691,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐいーと自分から遠ざける。","translatedEnglishLine":"and pulled her away from himself."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の幸せとは、主の幸せ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All my actions are for the master."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また音もなく姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: disappeared quietly without a sound again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、ビスケッタさんはすごい方ですね」
「しかし……俺の世話をシィルに押しつけるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... to push off taking care of me onto Shiru...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんのやることとしては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's incredibly unexpected for something Biscetta-san would do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、ビスケッタさんがあそこまで言うなら、
多分それがいいのだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's probably for the best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、ちょっと城内でも見て回るか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let's take a look around the castle for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいですね、ランス様」
「うむ、俺様の城の屋上はいつもこんな感じだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm, the rooftop of my castle is always like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がさがさと草をかき分けてキバ子が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rustling through the grass, Kibako appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キバ子はランスを見つけると、
パーッと満面の笑みを浮かべた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she revealed a big, beaming smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、なんだ撫でて欲しいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, do you want me to pet you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、ランスが手を伸ばすと――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance reached out his hand—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、キバ子はランスの周りを回り出した。
こらこら、落ち着かないか」
頭を撫でるという言葉に反応して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reacting to the words 'pet your head,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キバ子はパッと顔を輝かせた。
「がうがうがうがうがうがう！」
ドーンとキバ子がランスを押し倒す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a thud, Kibako pushed Rance down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Lick lick lick lick lick lick lick lick>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして嬉しそうにランスの頬をぺろぺろと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, happily licking Rance's cheek repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: く、首筋を舐めるんじゃない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-don't lick my neck like that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがキバ子の小さな肩を掴んで、
ぐいーと自分から遠ざける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pulled her away from himself.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の幸せとは、主の幸せ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All my actions are for the master."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また音もなく姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: disappeared quietly without a sound again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、ビスケッタさんはすごい方ですね」
「しかし……俺の世話をシィルに押しつけるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... to push off taking care of me onto Shiru...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんのやることとしては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's incredibly unexpected for something Biscetta-san would do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、ビスケッタさんがあそこまで言うなら、
多分それがいいのだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's probably for the best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、ちょっと城内でも見て回るか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let's take a look around the castle for a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいですね、ランス様」
「うむ、俺様の城の屋上はいつもこんな感じだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm, the rooftop of my castle is always like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がさがさと草をかき分けてキバ子が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rustling through the grass, Kibako appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キバ子はランスを見つけると、
パーッと満面の笑みを浮かべた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she revealed a big, beaming smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、なんだ撫でて欲しいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, do you want me to pet you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、ランスが手を伸ばすと――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance reached out his hand—

こらこら、落ち着かないか」
頭を撫でるという言葉に反応して、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キバ子はパッと顔を輝かせた。

ドーンとキバ子がランスを押し倒す。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろぺろ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Lick lick lick lick lick lick lick lick>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして嬉しそうにランスの頬をぺろぺろと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, happily licking Rance's cheek repeatedly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: く、首筋を舐めるんじゃない！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-don't lick my neck like that!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがキバ子の小さな肩を掴んで、
